data.title: Johnny Wright Obituary

data.meta_site_name: Johnny Wright Obituary | October 10, 2021 | Forest Hill, MD
data.text:
On October 10, 2021, Johnny Wilson Wright, 55, of Havre De Grace, MD passed away. He was the loving son of Helen Wright (nee Hanks) & the late James Allen Wright, Sr.; dear brother of James Wright, Jr. and his wife Tina, and Michael Wright & his wife Sheila; loving uncle of Jeremy Wright & his wife Julie, and Kylie Wright. Also survived by many loving aunts, uncles, and cousins.

Family and friends will honor Johnny’s life at the Evans Life Celebration Home– Bel Air, 3 Newport Drive (Rt. 23 & Rt. 24), Forest Hill on Thursday, October 14, 2021 from 10 – 11 AM where a funeral service will begin at 11 AM. Interment to follow at Bel Air Memorial Gardens.
